short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple but smart notepad; A place to go to get out your thoughts quickly and save them for later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Memento is a very simple and elegant, yet smart offline notepad with rich text-editing capabilities. It allows you to take as many notes as you would like. Not only that, but you can also access your notes quickly and simply.

ðŸŒ¿ Use the notepad in Latin. 
ðŸŒ¿ Create and Restore Backups 
ðŸŒ¿ Export and Import Markdown
ðŸŒ¿ Note Archive and recovery system

ðŸŒ¿ Multiple Language Support (currently EN, DE, HR, ES, HI, FR, LA, PT, ZH, EL, SK)
ðŸŒ¿ Data Privacy and anonymity.
